page.title: 10THE CHILBRIDGE FARM
page.content: The land around {BADBURY RINGS is national trust property previously owned by descendants of John Banks who held the office of Lord Chief Justice who was given the land by the crown as reward for his services during the civil war.It is farmed by families leasing the land.Three of the farms in this area have been farmed by the Richard's family since 1869.Today it is farmed by Messrs{G H& W J M Richard's assisted by a farm manager and three departmental heads. The total staff is{50}many of whom are specialists,all the necessary service jobs and development work is undertaken by the staff. though less of a{community,}over half the {employees}live on the farms in the {20 cottages provided.
